text:
@GovMurphy The cloth face coverings recommended are not surgical masks or N-95 respirators. This is said by the CDC & 90% of people r wearing those & head rags. So tell me how is this helpful to wearing a mask that doesn't work??
https://t.co/MSgkNG0QQV
